# tibble and triblle

load packages
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

tibble
```{r}
tibble("v1" = 1:10,
       "v2" = 10,
       "v3" = v1*v2)
```
tribble
```{r}
tribble(~v1, ~v2, ~v3,
        "x",  2 ,  4 ,
        "y",  5 , 32 ,
        "z",  3 , 23 )
```
tribble make a table like data entry in spreadsheet, while tibble make a table like row wise.
